bibl.title: In Pursuit of Invisibility: Ritual Texts from Late Roman Egypt. (American Studies in Papyrology. 47.)
bibl.note: Prolegomena. - Texts and Commentaries. Studies 7 invisibility spells in Greek magical papyri: 1. P. Oxy. LVIII, 3931; - 2. P.G.M. I, 222-231; - 3. P.G.M. I, 247-262 [Greek and Coptic]; - 4. P.G.M. VII, 619-622; - 5. P.G.M. XIII, 234-237; - 6. P.G.M. XIII, 267-269; - 7. P.G.M. XIII, 270-277. - Bibliography. Indices.
PHILLIPS Richard L., In Pursuit of Invisibility: Ritual Texts from Late Roman Egypt. (American Studies in Papyrology. 47.)
Durham, North Carolina, American Society of Papyrologists (Diffusion: Oxbow Books), 2009, 4Â°, xvi-199 pp. et 7 pll. ISBN 978-0-9700591-9-2. $49.95.
